div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 335 Delos, 1908 (312) Burial: c. 88 B.C. (T) Contents: 13 AR. From excavations Athens: 6 New Style tetradr. Mithradates VI: 7 tetradr. (93/2 B.C.) Disposition: Athens Svoronos, JIAN 1911, pp. 57-8 † Thompson, Athens (Delos ΙΔ), p. 520 Lewis, NC 1962, p. 284 Hackens, BCH 1965, p. 516
